NavBar.QuitConfirm: Czy chcesz zamknąć AYASpace?

DisplayChangedTip.QuitConfirm:
W celu zapewnienia lepszego komfortu użytkowania AYASpace,
należy ponownie uruchomić oprogramowanie po zmianie rozdzielczości.

KeyboardCheckTip.ConfirmText:
Program do aktualizacji sterowników został zainstalowany,
Proszę ponownie uruchomić urządzenie.

FirstUse.StepOne:
P i e r w s z e S p o t k a n i e Przytrzymaj Pomiń Następny Witaj! Graczu
AYA Space jest dla Ciebie oprogramowaniem do zarządzania zawartością gier na PC. AYA Space jest oprogramowaniem służącym do zarządzania grami na Twojej konsoli AYANEO Być może nie jesteś jeszcze zaznajomiony z tą funkcjonalnośćią, ale nie martw się. Teraz dokonamy kilku ustawień. zamknięcie poprzednia wersja aktualizacja zawartości

StepTwo.Title: G a m e M a n a g e m e n t && P l a t f o r m
StepTwo.TextThree: Jeśli chcesz doinstalować kolejną platformę z grami, to możesz wybrać ją po prawej stronie. A instalacja rozpocznie się autmatycznie.

StepThree.Title: F i n i s h i n g t h e f i n a l w o r k
StepThree.TextFour: Daj nam jeszcze chwilę, a nowe doświdczenie z rozgrywki wkrótce się ropocznie.

StepFour.Title: E n j o y y o u r A Y A N E O

Game.Title1: The game library seems a bit empty
Game.Title2: Why not try what we designed for you
Game.InstructionsAndRemindersContent:
You are about to turn on the automatic upload screenshot function, which provides

a better experience for you to share game screenshots.At the same time, the uploaded

screenshot data will be saved in your personal database on the AYANEO server.

Your consent is required for usage data and synchronization functions. Please read the

"Software License Agreement" and "Privacy Policy"，in detail.Turning on the function

will mean that you understandand know our related policies.

is turned on and connected to the power source.

Please do not turn off the power, sleep, or close the softwareduring the upgrade process.
Follow the prompts after the upgrade is

Vibration.Title: Vibration Intensity
Vibration.ViolentAdjustTip: Suitable for most AAA games, experience the most intense vibrations
Vibration.GentleAdjustTip: Soft, gentle, caress your palms, suitable for more casual players
Vibration.CustomAdjustTip: Choose your own intensity level, save it, make the experience your own

PowerLevel.Title: TDP
PowerLevel.GameTitle: Meeting the demands of most AAA game titles
PowerLevel.BalanceTitle: Factory preset, balanced for most games
PowerLevel.UnlockPowerTips:
Whether to unlock 15W TDP？

Note that there will be increased heat and noise when unlocked.

Unlocking takes effect only at this time of booting, and it needs to be unlocked again after rebooting.

QuickKey.Title: Suck
QuickKey.text: Windows operation shortcuts,can be opened again quickly

Joystick.Title: Joystick/Button Calibration instructions
Joystick.Desc: You can try the following operations when the joystick and LT/RT are not sensitive:
Joystick.StepText1_2: simultaneously for 2 seconds
Joystick.StepText1_3: <font size="4" color="#%X%">and release the buttons when the controller vibrates.</font>
Joystick.StepText2:
RS and LS dual joysticks rotate one full circle at the maximum,
LT/RT (dual trigger) is pressed down three times.
Joystick.StepText3: <font size="4" color="#%X%">When the calibration is completed, the controller will vibrate and feedback.</font>
Joystick.UpdateStep:
Please upgrade the controller firmware to the latest version, you can download the controller
firmware through AYASpace, and upgrade according to the upgrade tutorial .
Joystick.AirStepText1: <font size="4" color="#%X%">Simultaneously press LB + RB + Dpad Left + B keys. </font>
Joystick.AirStepText2: When the joystick controller vibrates, release the button, The LS RS has a maximum of five revolutions.

CustomKey.Title: Custom key
CustomKey.TipTop: The custom ky only takes effect when AYASpace is started. When it is not started, the default button is Press: show desktop / Hold: task manager.
CustomKey.TipBottom: With future version iterations, the function of this module will be changed, please refer to the latest version.
CustomKey.FunShowDeskDesc: Equivalent to WIn + D display system desktop.
CustomKey.FunCloseAppDesc: It is equivalent to the operation of ALT+F4, close the current program.
CustomKey.FunOskDesc: The OSK can be used barely after tuned up.
CustomKey.FunEscDesc: Description: The ESC key of the keyboard.
CustomKey.FunXboxDesc: Equivalent to the function of Win + G, you can open the xbox assistant after configuration.
CustomKey.FunTaskViewDesc: Equivalent to Alt + TAB to quickly view the open program.
CustomKey.FunTaskMgrDesc: You can quickly enter the entrance of the task manager, or perform soft shutdown operations.
CustomKey.ShoulderKeyTitle: Open up more possibilities for refreshing operations。
CustomKey.ShoulderKeyDesc: The custom shoulder key only takes effect when AYASpace is started. The default key is "LC" when it is not started. Short press: OSK / Long press: Task Manager, "RC" Short press: ESC / Long press: Task view.

FreeButton.Title: Free Button
FreeButton.Desc: Let the Button change with your habits.
FreeButton.TipBottom: The key configuration will take effect in Windows and the game, and AYASpace will still operate according to the key prompt.
FreeButton.BtnConfirm: Whether to change the button configuration?

RGB.Title: RGB lighting effect
RGB.CloseDesc: Open up more possibilities for refreshing operations
RGB.CloseDesc2: With the iteration of future versions, the function of this module will change, please refer to the latest version.

PopOtherDeviceTipPage.Title: Dear Gamers
PopOtherDeviceTipPage.TipInfo: Thank you for your love of AYANEO's exclusive game management software AYASpace.Unfortunately, our team is currently unable to serve non-AYANEO players. In this software, we have provided many convenient functions for gamersMany of these functions can only be used on AYANEO series.If you would like to experience AYASpace, please purchase AYANEO game console,We are very much looking forward to serving you on your gaming journey.
PopOtherDeviceTipPage.Shop: 国内玩家可前往官方淘宝店铺

PopResolutionSetting.FirstSettingTitle:
AYA Space provides you with a convenient function to adjust the display resolution, but this
function may cause screen blurring depending on the driving situation.

If you need to use it, please try to change it before entering the game, and ensure that the official AMD driver is installed and the GPU scaling function is turned on.

If thescreen is blurred，after the change, you can quickly double-click the middle area of ​​the
screen with two fingers Or press the B key to return o the resolution before the change。
PopResolutionSetting.FirstSettingTitle1:
AYA Space provides you with a convenient function to adjust the display resolution, but this
function may cause screen blurring depending on the driving situation.

If you need to use it, please try to change it before entering the game, and ensure that the official AMD driver is installed and the GPU scaling function is turned on.

If thescreen is blurred，after the change, you can quickly three-click the middle area of ​​the
screen with two fingers Or press the B key to return o the resolution before the change。
PopResolutionSetting.ChangedTitle: Change to %s
PopResolutionSetting.SettingFinishTitle:
Is the current display correct? If you need to restore the resolution,
you can double-tap the middle area of the screen three times or press the B key.

a better experience for you to share game screenshots.At the same time, the uploaded

BindBluetooth.BindDesc: Make your AYANEO easier to use from now on
BindBluetooth.DownloadTip: Please search for "AYA Space Mobile" in Apple AppStore, PlayStore or search and download in major application markets
BindBluetooth.BindTip: In the App - Space - Bind Device page, select Scan Code Binding
BindBluetooth.BindSuccessTip: This machine is bound to the following devices
BindBluetooth.AppScanTip: Open the AYA Space APP and scan to bind the device

FirmwareUpgrade.FirmwareUpgradeDesc: The new controller firmware has been downloaded, please follow the instructions below to upgrade the controller firmware.
FirmwareUpgrade.Press: 2、Hold LS to power on, enter the system and start AYASpace.
FirmwareUpgrade.ReadyDesc: The controller firmware upgrade is being prepared, please do not operate the buttons and wait patiently.
FirmwareUpgrade.UpDesc: The controller firmware is being upgraded, please wait a moment. During the upgrade process, please do not operate the buttons, shut down or hibernate.
FirmwareUpgrade.FailDesc: Could not find a newer version of firmware locally, please useSettings - Update to see if there is a newer firmware
FirmwareUpgrade.SuccessDesc: The controller firmware upgrade has been completed, and your AYANEO has a better experience.
